DESCRI

description: Proposed replacement of existing clubhouse terrace paving and repositioning ramp and terrace steps
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted for LPA to assess whether the works would amount to development under section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) (the 1990 Act) and whether the works would be excluded from the definition of development as provided for in Section 55 (2) of the 1990 Act. Notwithstanding, if the proposal would require planning permission under section 57 of the 1990 Act, it has not been demonstrated that the proposal has been granted  permission by a secondary legislation such as the The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
